name: The North Face Aphrodite 2.0 Capris - Women's
description: Whether you’re heading to the local dog park or a bucket list destination, the Aphrodite 2.0 Capris are built for days on the go. Comfortable stretch, adjustable legs and UV protection, grear for summer days.Lightweight nylon blend dries quickly and has an easy stretch.PFC-free DWR finish shrugs off unexpected showers and keeps your shorts cleaner longer.UPF 50 blocks more than 98% of harsh UV.Elastic encased waistband and drawcord combo let you customize the fit.2 front hand pockets for day-to-day must-haves and a hidden zippered pocket for valuables.Reinforced stitching adds toughness.Cinchable, adjustable legs are ready for a spur of the moment wading.Standard fit.
